name: Drowsy Game Dev
description:
Drowsy Game Dev! Everybody has promised themselves that they're going to stay up all night doing their work, and fell asleep a short amount of time later Well, this game simulates that. Press on the keyboard to be productive and press on the energy drink can to stay awake BUG FIX

On a restart, the game scene may freeze, just press on the can and the scene will unfreeze and become playable
